title: Exquisite Diamond and Emerald Kasulaperu Haaram with South Sea Pearls
materials: 44 stones). Finished with authentic Hyderabadi Polish.
features: This opulent Haaram features intricate filigree work accentuated with dazzling brilliant-cut diamonds. The central pendant is adorned with a large, oval-cut Zambian emerald, surrounded by a halo of smaller emeralds and delicate diamond detailing. The design incorporates the classic Kasulaperu (coin) element, meticulously embedded with diamonds. Lustrous South Sea pearls are delicately suspended from the lower tier, adding a touch of regal elegance. The design is inspired by traditional temple jewelry.
occasions: and other grand celebrations. A statement piece for those who appreciate timeless elegance and cultural heritage.
description: A masterpiece of South Indian craftsmanship, this Haaram is a true investment piece. The combination of high-quality diamonds, vibrant emeralds, and luminous South Sea pearls creates a breathtaking display of luxury. Its traditional design holds cultural significance while offering a modern, sophisticated appeal. The Hyderabadi polish ensures a lasting shine and luster.
